snippet: Rick Santorum's three primary victories make perfect sense. He's the only candidate who truly reflects his party.
abstract: Rick Santorum's three primary victories make perfect sense. He's the only candidate who truly reflects his party.
lead_paragraph: Rick Santorum's three primary victories last night were the first ones in this campaign season that made some sense. At last, conservative voters united behind a candidate who actually resembles the Republican Party that Americans have come to know in the last three years.

headline.main: Finally Hearing from the Republican Core
